docs.lead_paragraph: Dr. Kermit Gosnell, 72, who operated a clinic, is facing four charges of first-degree murder related to late-term abortions.

headline.seo: Jury to Consider Murder Charges in Trial of Dr. Kermit Gosnell
headline.main: Both Sides Rest in Trial of a Philadelphia Abortion Doctor Charged With Murder
headline.print_headline: Both Sides Rest in Trial of a Philadelphia Abortion Doctor Charged With Murder

docs.abstract: Both sides rest in trial of Dr Kermit Gosnell of Philadelphia, facing four charges of first-degree murder related to late-term abortions; to anti-abortion leaders, graphic testimony in trial has power to break through decades of hardened positions in the abortion wars and resurrect national debate.
docs.snippet: Dr. Kermit Gosnell, 72, who operated a clinic, is facing four charges of first-degree murder related to late-term abortions.

docs.lead_paragraph: Live Action compared late-term abortion procedures in a Bronx center to those at the clinic of Dr. Kermit Gosnell, the Philadelphia doctor charged with killing viable fetuses.

headline.seo: Video Scrutinizes Late-Term Abortion Practices at Bronx Clinic
headline.main: Group Shows Covert Video of a Bronx Abortion Clinic
headline.print_headline: Group Releases Covert Video of a Bronx Abortion Clinic

docs.abstract: Anti-abortion group Live Action releases undercover video of a staff member describing late-term abortion procedures at the Dr Emily Women's Health Center in the Bronx; group has previously released videotapes of undercover visits to abortion clinics as part of its campaign against late-term abortions.
docs.snippet: Live Action compared late-term abortion procedures in a Bronx center to those at the clinic of Dr. Kermit Gosnell, the Philadelphia doctor charged with killing viable fetuses.
